Phrase: After passing through a gate and through a long tunnel, we came to an old railway line, which we thought was the Giant Tree Railway.
There, a human-speaking Samantha appears. It seems that Samanthas are not just Ghosts of the Mist, but is deeply connected to the Giant Tree.

Name: Putra
Phrase: You said you are the Samantha who guards the railway station. Does that mean this is the station Mary is referring to?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Strictly speaking, there is no station 'here' as you perceive it, because it is hidden by the Giant Tree and I, the will of the Giant Tree.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: But the magic train has stopped at the precise location. The Guardian of the Giant Tree guided the train to this location, as the route map from the knight, chosen by the Guardian of the Giant Tree, and the Guardian of the Giant Tree itself brought the train here.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That means it's the right place.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Well, Samantha? Can you explain it in a way that Putra can understand it? As clear as the seas and skies of Flamarine.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: She who knows the blues of the sea and the sky, come to the Station of the Blue Sea and the Scorching Sands. In the chasm between light and darkness, you will be tested by the Giant Tree.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Alight all the stations to qualify as Guardians of the Giant Tree. Determine the light and darkness of the Iris Cloud and proceed along the iron railway that leads to the Guardian's Chamber.

Name: Putra
Phrase: You mean I'm going to be tested?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Yes, Daughter of Flamarine. Go down to your station. Go through the trial and lead the others to their stations.'

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What exactly are the trials? 'You may alight at the station'... It didn't tell us where the stations were.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Well, does that mean we have to find the station~?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oh, Putra's body is glowing like a jellyfish.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Wow, really! I am half invisible, am I dreaming?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's not you imagination. I can see through you, I can see through you!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Oh my gosh! Am I going to turn into a jellyfish!?

Name: Mary
Phrase: This is the trial of the Giant Tree. Putra will now be dragged into the Mist of the Giant Tree.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: What's going to happen to ... Putra in the Mist?

Name: Mary
Phrase: She'll just be sent to the station by the Samantha. There she will be put through some sort of ordeal, which she must clear before we can go on. I assume this is what is meant by 'alighting the four stations'.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Once Putra clears her test, the Gates to the other stations will also open. Presumably, three more people will have to go through a similar trial.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I see. So it's me first. I wonder if we'll have a quiz all about Flamarine?

Name: Putra
Phrase: Don't make a long face like that, Vivienne. I'll be back. If it's about Flamarine, then there's no one else more perfect than me.

Name: Putra
Phrase: And you're all going to take it too, aren't you? I'll be the first to clear it! It's the most important role ever!

Name: Putra
Phrase: So, everyone, wait for me, OK? I'll be back with all the tips and tricks for the later trials!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Be really careful, please. You can no longer just go with the flow and the momentum like you usually do. It's not just for your own sake.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Yes, I'll try to think hard with the few brain cells I have. For Iris Cloud's sake, for everybody's sake.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Don't worry. I'm sure Miss Putra will be fine.

Name: 'Why, I'm here to pick you help, we're going to help father as soon as we can.
To? Your father? What's wrong with your father, Batu?
What silly stuff are you talking about? Of course it's your father.
My father was swallowed up by the Sea Phantom Mist a long time ago and he's been missing ever since.
His ship hasn't been found in any of the waters. There is no way he could be found...
But we found him. It's where you and your father last met. You know, that island you two used to catch crabs, Pulau Ketam.
Pulau Ketam, is that where my father's boat was?
Just come. You'll know it when you see it.
My father is back...? Is that really possible...?
This is the sea cave where... HMS Repulse was located.
This is a ship graveyard. This is where the ships that were lost in the Sea Phantom Mist gather.
What are you talking about, Batu? Everything we found there was gone when the Mist lifted.
And... I did not see my father's ship.
But you looked for it, didn't you? You were looking for your father's ship, to see if it might be there.
Well, I thought it might be there, but...
Your father has been waiting for you for years, trapped in the Sea Phantom Mist.
I'm sure Putra will come to my rescue. Unlike your mother who lives in the mines, Putra lives in the sea. So I'm sure she will come looking for me... That's what I'm sure your father thought.
Batu? What the? Do you know anything about my father?

Yes, I know everything. I am the heir to the Skanda Mercenaries, you know? I've seen a lot of the sad reality of this world. I know what happens to people who are engulfed by the Phantom Mist, and what they had gone through.

Come on, come with me and pick up your father. He's waiting for you on the ship. It's been a long time since you two had seen each other. He can spoil you a lot. Tell him all your stories to reminisce about together.
Tell him about you joining the SSS, about your friends who didn't know anything about the sea, and the many times you have faced certain death.
Hearing the voices of captains who fought against the sky through the oil and blood stained waters.
As well as the Mist stones that your mother collects so desperately, stones that killed so many people.

Where is the guarantee that the neutralized Mist stones are safe? Just as you can never be absolutely sure that the inside of a barrier is safe, the mining of Mist stones doesn't necessarily make everyone happy too, does it?
You're very perceptive, Putra. Come on, let's go inside the boat together.
We'll kick the crap out of anyone who gets in the way. I'll take care of everything. I can fight without mercy, even against humans.
I'm an idiot. I can't study to save myself, and the hard things you told me just now, I don't understand any of it at all either.
What's going to happen if I'm all alone? I think about that all the time.
If it hadn't been for Vivienne, Conductor and Yoshino, I wouldn't be able to do anything. I've faced so many situations like that, all the way up even until I came here.
I may be an idiot, but I'm rather sensitive if people changed.
Batu would never say that. Batu is certainly brave and likes to fight, but she would never say anything that would hurt her friends.
'I cannot hurt people', that's the reason why she hasn't made friends for so long. Batu is not good with emotions, but she takes very good care of her friends and family.'
Batu would never speak ill of my family. I met Batu before I entered military school, she knows how I used to be a crybaby.

When cried a lot when I was a child, I cried when I was angry. I cried when I was lonely. I cried because I wanted to see my mother, who didn't come back from the mountains for work. I cried because I wanted to have a brother or sister to go through all this, I was alone and in pain...
I cried the hardest, when my father never came back from the sea.
Everything you have said just now is impossible, the fact that my father is here, the fact that Batu is speaking ill of my mother's work.

If you are really the Batu who grew up in the Skanda Caves, you must know what it feels like for a woman in the mines to dig for Mist stones. The peaceful sea and the dangerous Flamarine mountains is night and day. There's always someone dead in the mountains.
But it is worth the risk to dig, that's why the women in the mines risk their lives digging and polishing the Mist stones. That's why they support Iris Cloud's livelihood.
So you don't want to see your father?
I want to see him. I wish I could. But my father is not here.
If my father was here, he would grab you by the neck and beat you. Even if you were the real Batu, he wouldn't give you any mercy.
Heh, you're pointing your spear at me?
The real Batu can avoid me... or rather, the real Batu would've already long taken my spear.
So I'm going to beat you up back to your original form and meet up with the others.
You have a broad heart and vision unashamed of the colours of the sky and the sea. You are welcomed into the station of Scorching Sands and Blue Seas.
Vivienne
Phrase: Goodness, you're back. Are you hurt? Are you okay?

Name: Putra
Phrase: No, no, I'm fine. I'm Putra, everyone's idol, always cheerful and pretty.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Thank heavens, your consciousness seems to be a bit cloudy, but your body seems to be fine.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Hey Putra, what were the trials like? Did you fight monsters or solve hard problems?

Name: Putra
Phrase: Nah, it was just a Flamarine quiz, just as I thought. And it was pretty easy♪

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Well, if it's like that... I guess I'll be alright too

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Now the question is whether Putra really passed the trial or not.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Did you get any hints about the next station? Or maybe a key to open portals of the sorts?

Name: Mary
Phrase: No, Putra certainly completed the trial. Look over there.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's on the tracks, so we can take the Mist Train through.

Name: Mary
Phrase: If we continue on that way we should be able to get to the next station for the trial. According to the route map, this gate seems to run right up to the Giant Tree.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Right up to the Giant Tree...

Name: Mary
Phrase: We'll never know what's going to happen when we go in there. Anyone going through the trial should be prepared. Only three stations left.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: The railway line of the Giant Tree is bound by the light and dark of the Five Countries...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: No one must be left out. Not a single one.
